meta.name: Check Missions
meta.description: Checks whether the user has completed all of the actions that make up a mission, and whether they have already been rewarded for completing the mission. [Full Documentation Here](https://docs.openformat.tech/no-code/buildship/nodes/check-missions)

meta.name: Create web3 Account
meta.description: Creates a web3 account for your user. You can learn more about what this is and how it benefits your users here.

meta.name: Get Leaderboard
meta.description: Returns a leaderboard based on the amount of experience points (XP) users have earned.

meta.name: Get User Information
meta.description: Returns the user's experience point (XP) balance, the badges they have collected and the actions they have completed within that specific dApp.

meta.name: Reward Badge
meta.description: Reward a user with a badge for completing an action or mission. [Full documentation here](https://docs.openformat.tech/no-code/buildship/nodes/reward-badge)

meta.name: Reward XP
meta.description: Reward a user with experience points (XP) for completing an action.
